Parameters: Animator: The animation which was repeated.
onAnimationRepeat(android.animation.Anim.Description: Notifies the repetition of the animation.

Parameters: boolean: Whether the animation is playing in reverse.
onAnimationStart(android.animation.Anima.Description: Notifies the start of the animation as well as the animation's overall play direction. This method's default behavior is to call @B_android#animation#Animator#AnimatorListener#onAnimationStart_E@. This method can be overridden, though not required, to get the additional play direction info when an animation starts. Skipping calling super when overriding this method results in @B_android#animation#Animator#AnimatorListener#onAnimationStart_E@ not getting called.
onAnimationStart(android.animation.Anima.FullName: public void onAnimationStart (Animator animation, boolean isReverse)

onAnimationStart(android.animation.Anima.Description: Notifies the start of the animation.

Parameters: Animator: The animation which reached its end.
onAnimationEnd(android.animation.Animato.Description: Notifies the end of the animation. This callback is not invoked for animations with repeat count set to INFINITE.

Parameters: Animator: The animation which was canceled.
onAnimationCancel(android.animation.Anim.Description: Notifies the cancellation of the animation. This callback is not invoked for animations with repeat count set to INFINITE.

Parameters: Animator: The animation which reached its end.
boolean: Whether the animation is playing in reverse.
onAnimationEnd(android.animation.Animato.Description: Notifies the end of the animation. This callback is not invoked for animations with repeat count set to INFINITE. This method's default behavior is to call @B_android#animation#Animator#AnimatorListener#onAnimationEnd_E@. This method can be overridden, though not required, to get the additional play direction info when an animation ends. Skipping calling super when overriding this method results in @B_android#animation#Animator#AnimatorListener#onAnimationEnd_E@ not getting called.
onAnimationEnd(android.animation.Animato.FullName: public void onAnimationEnd (Animator animation, boolean isReverse)

ClassDesc: An animation listener receives notifications from an animation. Notifications indicate animation related events, such as the end or the repetition of the animation.
